SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.storage.data.repositories

Schnittstelle ICalendarEntryRepository

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
CalendarEntryRepository
public interface ICalendarEntryRepository
Repository interface for managing CalendarEntry entities.

This interface defines methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CalendarEntry entities. Implementations of this interface are responsible for interacting with the underlying data store.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    boolean
    createCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
    Creates a new calendar entry in the data store.
    boolean
    deleteCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
    Deletes a calendar entry from the data store.

    getCalendarEntries()

    Retrieves a specific calendar entry by its unique identifier.

  • Methodendetails

    • getCalendarEntries

      List<CalendarEntry> getCalendarEntries()
      Retrieves all calendar entries from the data store.
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of all calendar entries.

    • getCalendarEntry

      CalendarEntry getCalendarEntry(int id)
      Retrieves a specific calendar entry by its unique identifier.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of the calendar entry.
      Gibt zurück:
      the calendar entry with the specified id, or null if not found.

    • createCalendarEntry

      boolean createCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Creates a new calendar entry in the data store.
      Parameter:
      calendarEntry - the calendar entry to be created.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the calendar entry was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • deleteCalendarEntry

      boolean deleteCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Deletes a calendar entry from the data store.
      Parameter:
      calendarEntry - the calendar entry to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the calendar entry was deleted successfully, false otherwise.
